address.aria-label: Address for Sioux Center Comm School District

span.data-emptytext: Sioux Center Comm School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: The Sioux Center Community School District offers career and technical programs in the following areas: Family and Consumer Science, Business and Computers, Industrial Technology and Agriculture. The Sioux Center Community School District is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. It is an unfair or discriminatory practice for any educational institution to discriminate on the basis of race, creed, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, religion, age (for employment), disability, socioeconomic status (for programs), marital status (for programs), or veteran status in its educational programs and its employment practices. Inquiries or grievances may be directed to Gary McEldowney, Superintendent, 550 9th St NE, Sioux Center, IA 51250, (712) 722-2985, gary.mceldowney@scwarriors.org. Please see District Board policies 505.15 complaints and grievances and 401.1 Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action.

p.span: The Sioux Center Community School District offers career and technical programs in the following areas: Family and Consumer Science, Business and Computers, Industrial Technology and Agriculture. The Sioux Center Community School District is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. It is an unfair or discriminatory practice for any educational institution to discriminate on the basis of race, creed, color, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, religion, age (for employment), disability, socioeconomic status (for programs), marital status (for programs), or veteran status in its educational programs and its employment practices. Inquiries or grievances may be directed to Gary McEldowney, Superintendent, 550 9th St NE, Sioux Center, IA 51250, (712) 722-2985, gary.mceldowney@scwarriors.org. Please see District Board policies 505.15 complaints and grievances and 401.1 Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
